job_title: Senior Developer - Business Intelligence (IT): Information Technology Admin
job_text: ['Responsible for creating and updating centralized data models in our DW / BI platform using existing tools while following established standards, policies and procedures. Conducts data discovery, data profiling and data modeling. Builds Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) processes to normalize, apply business rules, and load data into tabular and multi-dimensional models within our DW / BI platform.', 'Works with assigned application teams to stay up-to-date with their data models, applications, tools, workflows and regulations. Identifies upcoming workflow changes or software upgrades that may impact reports, dashboards or centralized data models. Works closely with BI Analysts to design specifications for new centralized data models or updates to existing ones.', 'Responsible for proactive monitoring of assigned DW / BI processes. Leverages expertise to troubleshoot more challenging issues, perform root cause analysis and take preventive actions. Creates and maintains test scripts for validation and integrated testing. Responsible for leading testing efforts to ensure existing reports, extracts and centralized data models will continue to work well after workflow changes or software upgrades.', 'Assists with and mentors other BI Developers and BI analysts in creating reports and dashboards for business leaders, as well as creating scheduled processes to extract data and transfer it to third parties or applications. Helps troubleshoot more complex issues with reports, dashboards, and extracts. Makes recommendations to improve performance, turn-around times, readability and compliance of reports, dashboards, and extracts. . Assists BI Architect(s) with some application owner responsibilities for specific tools within the DW/BI platform.', 'Leverages advanced analytics technologies within our DW / BI platform and assist with implementation, maintenance and support of these technologies. Help promote use of these technologies through documentation and training.', 'STANDARDS OF BEHAVIOR: Acts in a manner that supports the standards of communication, respect, privacy, and teamwork by demonstrating a commitment to professional and ethical conduct.', 'CUSTOMER SERVICE: Demonstrates commitment to service excellence by promptly addressing internal/external customer issues/requests, resolving concerns while maintaining a professional image and behavior to build and enhance the patient/family/customer experience.', 'ACCOUNTABILITY: Accepts ownership of job roles and specific assignments/goals; works independently, takes responsibility for own actions; admits mistakes and judgment errors; and accepts constructive feedback. Connects personal work results to the accomplishment of team and organizational goals.', 'RESPONDING TO CHANGE: Accepts change and adapts in a positive and productive manner; handles unexpected situations and changes in direction calmly and with confidence. Views new assignments and job responsibilities as an opportunity for growth.', 'IT CUSTOMER SUPPORT: Responds timely to end user requests for technical assistance.', 'PROBLEM SOLVING: Ability to identify, analyze and effectively solve problems.', 'CONTENT PRESENTATION AND DELIVERY: Presents and delivers content for end users with consistent branding, look and feel', 'DATA WAREHOUSING: Develops and supports centralized data models specialized for the reporting and analytics needs of the health system.', 'High School Diploma or Equivalent', 'Bending and Stooping 60.00%', 'Climbing 60.00%', 'Keyboard Entry 60.00%', 'Kneeling 60.00%', 'Lifting/Carrying Patients 35 Pounds or Greater 20.00%', 'Lifting or Carrying 0 - 25 lbs Non-Patient 60.00%', 'Lifting or Carrying 25.01 lbs - 75 lbs Non-Patient 60.00%', 'Lifting or Carrying > 75 lbs Non-Patient 20.00%', 'Pushing or Pulling 0 - 25 lbs Non-Patient 60.00%', 'Pushing or Pulling 26 - 75 lbs Non-Patient 60.00%', 'Pushing or Pulling > 75 lbs Non-Patient 20.00%', 'Reaching 60.00%', 'Repetitive Movement Foot/Leg 20.00%', 'Repetitive Movement Hand/Arm 20.00%', 'Sitting 60.00%', 'Squatting 60.00%', 'Standing 60.00%', 'Walking 60.00%', 'Audible Speech 80.00%', 'Hearing Acuity 80.00%', 'Depth Perception 60.00%', 'Distinguish Color 60.00%', 'Seeing - Far 40.00%', 'Seeing - Near 60.00%', 'Bio hazardous Waste 20.00%', 'Biological Hazards - Respiratory 20.00%', 'Biological Hazards - Skin or Ingestion 20.00%', 'Blood and/or Bodily Fluids 20.00%', 'Communicable Diseases and/or Pathogens 20.00%', 'Dust 60.00%', 'Gas/Vapors/Fumes 20.00%', 'Hazardous Chemicals 20.00%', 'Computer Monitor 60.00%', 'Fire Risk 20.00%', 'Hazardous Noise 20.00%', 'Moving Mechanical Parts 40.00%', 'Needles/Sharp Objects 40.00%', 'Potential Electric Shock 40.00%', 'Potential for Physical Assault 20.00%', 'Radiation 20.00%', 'Wet or Slippery Surfaces 40.00%']

['World class plastic surgeon - based in Paramus, NJ is seeking a Patient Sales Coordinator with a strong sales background. You must be willing to live within 20-30 minutes of the office location without exception.', 'This practice is owned by a board-certified plastic surgeon, who caters to an elite, but family-focused clientele, where thousands of procedures and treatments have been executed with the most natural and impressive results.This rare opportunity to join one of the nation’s most successful practices of its kind affords the winning candidate the opportunity to earn excellent income while helping others.', 'This practice specializes in cosmetic plastic surgery as well as non-surgical treatments such as skin resurfacing, fillers, Botox and more.', 'The winning candidate must be willing to work in a sleeves-rolled, hands-on fashion, doing "whatever it takes" to help the team grow. This is NOT an administrative position - it is a sales position with some admin work. There must be a focus on driving sales and results, coupled with a fervent desire to implement and sustain organization and efficiency throughout the practice. Relationship building ability as well as a desire to perform outreach with a positive attitude and friendly demeanor is a must.', 'Annual pay based on results for year one is composed of base pay and bonuses. Income is uncapped, but typical first year income can range including base salary and bonuses from $75,000-$85,000+ and with superb performance additional income can be earned in year one. Ability to earn uncapped income in future years is possible, and typical.', 'Paid Vacation after 1 year.', 'Medical benefits, 401K, and other benefits provided after probation period per company policy.', 'Positive work environment working directly, daily, with the doctor and staff. This is one of the most sought-after practices with which to work in the country.', 'Reasonable hours', 'Sales - sell procedures, treatments and medical spa services ranging from several hundred dollars to over $30,000 to prospective patients through extensive phone conversations and live in-person consultations. 5 days per week will be focused on selling, through phone consultations, live consultations, email and phone follow-up and similar activities. Comfort with quoting and selling procedures and contacting literally hundreds of patients weekly is core to this role, as is intensive computer notation and follow-up.', 'Operations Assistance – assist in daily various duties to help the team including:', 'Event planning and execution.', 'Creating and reviewing reports.', 'Preparing patients for surgery and completing appropriate steps and paperwork', 'And more.', 'Organization– Task orientation, prompt completion of assignments, and an innate desire to “get things done” is a must. Knowledge of medical software like PatientNow or NexTech is preferred but not required.', 'Positivity– we seek a bubbly, positive, sunny outlook from our winning candidate who will work well with others. Drama or neediness of any kind or a lack of "go getter" personality is a non-starter in this role.', "Whatever it takes attitude with a sales focus. The winning candidate will have significant income upside - with no cap or limit - if results are achieved but must be willing to learn new concepts and unlearn intuitive ideas that do not match with the practice's structure. The selected candidate will report directly to the physician owner.", 'Bachelor’s degree is preferred', 'Bi-Lingual preferred (English + Spanish)', '2-5+ years of sales and/or sales management experience is required - the ideal candidate will be able to demonstrate prior results in a sales and service capacity performing among the best in their peer group. This position is not an administrative position. It is a sales position.', 'Must be confident and comfortable presenting prices ranging from several hundred dollars to over 30 thousand dollars, asking for the order and selling on the spot. A belief in and understanding of how to sell luxury items is a must.', 'Outstanding communication and presentation skills.', 'Belief in the power of cosmetic surgery, procedures and treatments to change the lives of appropriate candidates for the better.', 'Type accurately at no less than 40 wpm - 55 wpm a must. Strong computer skills with the ability to learn proprietary software for the medical industry quickly is paramount.', 'Excellent follow–up and organizational skills – an addiction to timely task completion without compromising quality is a must.', 'Professionalism in dress and presentation, honesty, excellent work ethic, no-drama attitude, and positive attitude a must. Working well with existing team members is important.', 'Willingness to utilize existing skills and talent, while simultaneously learning and executing the company’s proven system', 'PLEASE ENSURE YOU MEET THE REQUIREMENTS BEFORE APPLYING FOR THIS POSITION. OUR OFFICES WILL CONTACT YOU IF YOU ARE SELECTED FOR AN INITIAL INTERVIEW. PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT OUR OFFICES TO INQUIRE ABOUT THE STATUS OF YOUR APPLICATION.', 'PLEASE INCLUDE A BRIEF COVER LETTER AND CURRENT RESUME AND PERIODICALLY CHECK YOUR “JUNK” FOLDER FOR CORRESPONDENCE FROM OUR OFFICES SHOULD YOU NOT RECEIVE A REPLY. WE APPRECIATE YOUR TIME AND CONSIDERATION.', '401(k) Matching', 'Health Insurance', 'Monday to Friday', 'relevant sales: 3 years (Required)', "Bachelor's (Preferred)", 'Spanish (Preferred)', 'Bonuses', 'Detail-oriented -- quality and precision-focused', 'Aggressive -- competitive and growth-oriented', 'Outcome-oriented -- results-focused with strong performance culture', 'Waiting period may apply', 'Only full-time employees eligible', 'No']
